alert.note: Alert for Adams; Claiborne; Copiah; Franklin; Jefferson; Lawrence; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:06AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Tensas, northern Concordia, northeastern Catahoula and southern Franklin Parishes, Claiborne, northern Lincoln, northwestern Lawrence, Jefferson, northern Franklin, northeastern Adams and Copiah Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 105 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crystal Springs to Red Lick to 9 miles south of Wisner. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Crystal Springs, Red Lick and Lorman around 110 AM CDT. Fayette, Gallman and Blue Hill around 120 AM CDT. Hazlehurst around 125 AM CDT. Lee Bayou around 130 AM CDT. Mcnair around 135 AM CDT. Clayton, Martinsville and Union Church around 140 AM CDT. Ferriday, West Ferriday, Frogmore and New Hope around 145 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Harrisonburg, Roxie, Sicily Island, Meadville, Beauregard and Ridgecrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Claiborne; Copiah; Franklin; Jefferson; Lawrence; Lincoln
